        public static void saveCpfpV1Vectors(Chain[] chains,
                     java.lang.String filepath)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Calculates the CPFP V1 vector of all of these chains and saves it into a tab separated file (UNIX format)
        Parameters:
        chains - chain array of the chins to be examined
        filepath - the absolute location for the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the file could not be written

                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a ramachandran matrix into a file Format: UNIX tsv - file Note: rounds each value to 16 digits
        Parameters:
        matrix - the matrix which sould be saved
        filepath - the save file path of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File could not be written.

                           char separatorChar)
                                    throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        filepath - of the csv file in UNIX format, UTF8 encoded. No header rows were accepted! Data only!
        separatorChar -
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getChainsFromBatchFile

        public static Chain[] getChainsFromBatchFile(java.lang.String filename,
                             java.lang.String dsspLocation)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Get Chains from a List of PDB mol IDs Unix file format (\n), UTF-8 for comments: ignores Lines with starts with # ignores empty lines too uses Console output for logging
        Parameters:
        filename - the absolute path of the file which contains the pdb chain list
        dsspLocation - the absolute path of the folder which contains all .dssp structure files. should end with '/' and contain filenames like "1hho.dssp".
        Returns:
        all available chains which were in the batch file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
